metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8172 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The filesystem implementation in the Linux kernel before 3.13 performs certain operations on lists of files with an inappropriate locking approach, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (soft lockup or system crash) via unspecified use of Asynchronous I/O (AIO) operations.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-1-generic - 3.13.0-1.16
linux-image-3.13.0-1-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-1.16
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-1-generic - 3.13.0-1.16
No subscription required
